page.title: 16C.of E. PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
There has been a{school}in Astley since{1743}and the old school buildings, now a private house, are along a track behind the {POUND FARM. The{present building}dates from{1897 and had alterations in the early 1960's. The school's numbers qualify it for{2.5 teachers}(over 45 children and under 61 aged between 4 and 11).
As the headmistress,{MRS HAMPSON,} has just had a baby daughter, there is an acting headmistress at the school.
At 11+ the children move to the { {CHANTRY HIGH SCHOOL}at {MARTLEY,} transported there free by buses on contract to the County Council.
